snippet: A blanket of cold smothers Europe, bringing both wonder and fear, as a snowy Rome grinds to a halt and hundreds die in the east. Meanwhile, snow and ice hit North Africa. Rendezvous's guide to the best web coverage of the cold snap of 2012.
abstract: A blanket of cold smothers Europe, bringing both wonder and fear, as a snowy Rome grinds to a halt and hundreds die in the east. Meanwhile, snow and ice hit North Africa. Rendezvous's guide to the best web coverage of the cold snap of 2012.

headline.main: Ice in Europe, Snow in Africa
